title: Selfdual backgrounds in N=2 five-dimensional Chern-Simons Supergravity
abstract: We consider five-dimensional S(2,2|N) Chern-Simons supergravity on M_4 * R . By fine-tuning the Kaluza-Klein reduction to make the 4d cosmological constant equal zero, it is shown that selfdual curvatures on M_4 provide exact solutions to the equations of motion if N=2.
